scripts.prepush: npm run lint && rimraf dist && tsc --declaration
scripts.postupdate: git push origin main && git push --tags --no-verify && npm publish -f
scripts.update:major: npm version major -m "chore: set version to %s" && npm run postupdate
scripts.update:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: set version to %s" && npm run postupdate
scripts.update:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: set version to %s" && npm run postupdate
